author: edwardyoon
msg: Typo might lead to null tasks getting assigned to groom servers

author: rajith
msg: Added a failover test case that uses durable subscriptions.

author: rajith
msg: Improved the error handling and modified the parameters to pass in an address string when invoking a receiver or a sender.

author: rajith
msg: Modified the Sender and Receiver to work with the new addressing strings.
You could now invoke the sender or receiver by passing an addressing string as a program argument.
The sender and receiver could now be utilised more easily as a building block for scripting test cases.
Modified the TestLauncher to also work with addressing strings.
The Receiver was also modified to work as a durable subscriber if specified via a JVM arg.
